item.description:
Come join us for great food and entertainment on the beautiful and spacious grounds of Anheuser-Busch. This family-oriented event will feature nationally renowned professional “ribbers“ and local award-winning restaurants providing mouth-watering ribs for everyone to enjoy. Add great entertainment for children and adults and you have a recipe for fun and excitement. As the official New Hampshire State Barbecue Championships, you will experience some of the best grillers and BBQers in the northeast vying for title of New Hampshire Barbecue Grand Champion

This event is open to Children

James Montgomery Band featuring J. Geils is playing 6:30-8:30pm

Admission: $5.00 for adults, children under 15 Free. There are also amusement rides for the kids at
$10.00 ride all day or .50 per ticket. Parking is Free.
Bags, coolers, backpacks, and other containers are not allowed into the Rock 'N Ribfest except for childcare and medical needs. All bags will be checked prior to entering the event gate.

Tickets can be purchased online at: www.nhribfest.eclipseticket.com
For more information on the event, please see the webpage: www.rotaryribfest.org
item.name: Rock N Ribfest
